---
category: news
title: "“Data in space” in preview: Now Power BI can be truly everywhere"
excerpt: "We live in a connected world and almost everything around us generates data. Data in Space is new feature that uses augmented reality to create persistent spatial anchors in the real world and attach Power BI content to those anchors. Data in space connects your business data to your real-world scenarios"
